alert.note: Alert for Neshoba; Newton (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 12 at 3:33PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Leake, northern Newton and western Neshoba Counties through 415 PM CDT... At 333 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Standing Pine to near Sebastopol to near Prospect. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Dowdville around 345 PM CDT. Dixon, Stratton and Edinburg around 350 PM CDT. Neshoba around 355 PM CDT. Union around 400 PM CDT. Pearl River around 405 PM CDT. Philadelphia and Little Rock around 410 PM CDT. Tucker and Bethsaida around 415 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
